Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_LINEASFICHAB WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC
INSERT INTO CAM_LINEASFICHAB ( FICHABCODI, PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FICHABCODI, :PROYCODI, :FECPUESTAOPE, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )
UPDATE CAM_LINEASFICHAB SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, FECPUESTAOPE = :FECPUESTAOPE, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_LINEASFICHAB ORDER BY FICHABCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_LINEASFICHAB SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_LINEASFICHAB WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY FICHABCODI ASC
